Review request for hbase.

Summary
-------

Rename o.a.h.h.regionserver.wal.WALObserver to o.a.h.h.regionserver.wal.WALActionsListener

This addresses bug HBASE-4152.
https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HBASE-4152

Diffs
